amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of State to submit a report to Congress assessing the diplomatic initiatives of the United States and other interested parties in the period leading up to and during the war in Kosovo.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 13 printed in Part B of H. Rept. 106-235 to require the Secretary of State to submit a report, written by an independent panel of experts, evaluating the role of diplomacy in ending the conflict in Kosovo.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
